short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Jiffi Web Help extension to streamline website support requests and bug reporting

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Jiffi Web Help: Simple 1-click website support

The Jiffi Web Help Extension allows you to capture, annotate, highlight and draw on screen-shots of your web page, then send the finished product to Jiffi Web Help with a work request. 

If you’re not a native Tech-speaker, describing a technical problem to someone who is can be time-consuming and frustrating. Jiffi Web Help exists to help non-tech-speakers maintain and manage their websites, and this extension helps users explain what they want done quickly and easily. 

•	Instant 1-click screen-shot opens in new tab
•	Click on the image to add text, highlights, and arrows
•	Add a message and any files needed
•	Hit “submit” to send job request to Jiffi Web Help for an estimate of cost.
